Interface ITopicRepository

Repository interface for Topic related CRUD operations.

Namespace: MagicQuizDesktop.Models
Assembly: MagicQuizDesktop.dll
Syntax
public interface ITopicRepository

Methods

| Improve this Doc View Source

AddAsync(Topic, String)

Asynchronously adds a new topic with the provided authentication token.

Declaration
Task<ApiResponse<Topic>> AddAsync(Topic topic, string authToken)
Parameters
Type Name Description
Topic topic

The topic to add.
System.String authToken

The authentication token used in the request.
Returns
Type Description
System.Threading.Tasks.Task<ApiResponse<Topic>>

A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result contains the ApiResponse of Topic.
| Improve this Doc View Source

DeleteAsync(Int32, String)

Asynchronously deletes a topic with the given id using the provided authentication token.

Declaration
Task<ApiResponseWithNoData> DeleteAsync(int topicId, string authToken)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.Int32 topicId

The identifier of the topic to be deleted.
System.String authToken

The authentication token to validate the request.
Returns
Type Description
System.Threading.Tasks.Task<ApiResponseWithNoData>

A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result contains an ApiResponseWithNoData representing the response without any data from the server.

GetByAll(String)

Asynchronously gets all topics wrapped in an API response using the provided authentication token.

Declaration
Task<ApiResponse<List<Topic>>> GetByAll(string authToken)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.String authToken

The authentication token to use for the API call.
Returns
Type Description
System.Threading.Tasks.Task<ApiResponse<System.Collections.Generic.List<Topic>>>

A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result contains the API response that wraps the list of topics.

UpdateAsync(Topic, String)

Asynchronously updates a topic.

Declaration
Task<ApiResponse<Topic>> UpdateAsync(Topic topic, string authToken)
Parameters
Type Name Description
Topic topic

The topic to update.
System.String authToken

The authentication token.
Returns
Type Description
System.Threading.Tasks.Task<ApiResponse<Topic>>

A task that represents the asynchronous update operation. The task result contains the API response with the updated topic.
